summary: Iteration 17: Tested Dashboard reorganization, bottom navigation changes, and Issues page enhancements. All features verified: AQI widget shows Dammaiguda (large) with Hyderabad (small text), Dump Yard card next to AQI, 9 quick action boxes including Benefits, bottom nav has Home/Learn/Fit/Gifts/Profile (no Chat/Assistant), Issues page has All Issues and My Issues tabs with new status filter options.

minor.issue: Some 503 service unavailable errors in console logs (may be intermittent)

critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard.jsx: AQI widgets properly show Dammaiguda prominently with text-3xl for AQI value and Hyderabad in smaller text-[10px]
Dashboard.jsx: All 9 quick action boxes have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Layout.jsx: Bottom nav correctly updated to 5 items (Home, Learn, Fit, Gifts, Profile) without Chat/Assistant
IssueFeed.jsx: Tabs implemented correctly with All Issues and My Issues (disabled when not logged in)
IssueFeed.jsx: New status options properly added to statuses array with proper colors and icons
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Using existing test data.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard reorganization complete: Stories → AQI (Dammaiguda big/Hyderabad small) + Dump Yard card → Citizen Wall → 9 quick action boxes (Report, Issues, Benefits, Fit, Doctor, Family, Gifts, Education, Polls) → Benefits slider. Bottom nav: Home, Learn, Fit, Gifts, Profile (no Chat/Assistant). Issues page has All Issues / My Issues tabs with new statuses. Test user (9876543210) has no reported issues so My Issues shows empty state.
